title: Existence Magazine
paragraph:
I was tasked with creating a set of flyers for a Magazine Launch event. 
The flyers were to be printed in black and white, and the design was to be inspired by the magazine's identity.
The design was created using a combination of texturing and classic typography work on Photoshop.

title: (re)generation
paragraph:
A series of posters that explore the concept of (re)generation.
The posters are meant to be displayed in a sequence, with each poster representing a different form of the process.
